title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2581/98 of 30 November 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1372/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the poultrymeat sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2581/98 of 30 November 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1372/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the poultrymeat sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and III to Regulation (EC) No 1372/95 are replaced by the Annexes hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 November 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 77.
(2) OJ L 305, 19. 12. 1995, p. 49.
(3) OJ L 133, 17. 6. 1995, p. 26.
(4) OJ L 145, 15. 5. 1998, p. 8.
(5) See page 31 of this Official Journal.
